name: fullstack
description: Every chapter of this course is in its own directory. Some excercises are only named and don't have the excercise number on it.

scripts.build:ui: rm -rf build && cd ../part2-notes/ && npm run build && cp -r build ../notes-backend
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m uibuild && git push && npm run deploy

author: Leevi Koskimaa
